headline: American Water Works Shareholders Approve Share Issuance for Essential Utilities Merger Deal
summary: American Water Works (NYSE:AWK) held a virtual special meeting of shareholders to vote on matters related to its proposed merger with Essential Utilities. The meeting, conducted in an audio-only format, concluded with shareholders approving a proposal to issue shares of American Water common stock i

headline: A Look At American Water Works Company (AWK) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why American Water Works Company (AWK) Is On Investor Radars Today American Water Works Company (AWK) is back in focus after recent share price moves that have left the stock roughly flat over the past month but modestly positive over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for American Water Works Company.
